TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed InternalXmlHelper extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Provides properties and methods that support Visual Basic XML literals. This class is not intended to be used directly from your code.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the value of an XML attribute. This property is not intended to be used from your code.
Docs.value: The value of the XML attribute identified by the parameter from the first element in the supplied collection of XML elements. If the collection is empty, returns .
